Text:
Noob here. Can't figure how to play your UL's. Some instruction please?

Would like to see your stuff mate, like the Brest Fortress.

What do I need to do to play them?
VLC player or Media player classic  will play just about any file

Start with GOOGLE !!

I help you this time:

http://www.afterdawn.com/guides/archive/how_to_play_mp4_files.cfm

And the forum for this questing and help is here:

https://forum.suprbay.org/index.php

Good Luck :)

Thanks mate, very good link. Been at it for hours and still nothing. Will have to look elsewhere, or stick to the simple stuff.

... best.

@ Makb1: its pretty easy, all u need is a good media player just like zx6rider already said.
try a player with built-in codecs like the following:
- potplayer (the kmplayer redux, my personal favourite, easy to use by default but with a tremendous amount of functions if needed) 
- kmplayer 
- media player classic - home cinema
- vlc player 
they are free, safe and can handle almost any file u throw at them.

Yes, anoXmous & Zen_Bud
Charlize Theron deserve 1080p 2 see her!!!

Thanks very much
Audio is slightly out of sync
